pageTitle: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau speaks with His Majesty King Abdullah II of Jordan | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Today, the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, spoke with His Majesty King Abdullah II of Jordan. Prime Minister Trudeau expressed his deep condolences on the death of Jordanian citizen Mr. Munir Abdo Habib al-Najjar who was killed in the vehicular attack in Toronto on April 23, 2018.

Prime Minister Trudeau and His Majesty King Abdullah II also discussed national security and affirmed the strong partnership between Canada and Jordan.
